text: The Guardafui Channel, also known as the Socotra Passage, is a strait between Puntland and Socotra. Its width is roughy between Puntland and Abd al Kari,The Biology of Island Floras - Page 198, Juli Caujap√©-Castells - 2011 and roughly between Puntland and Socotra. ==References== Category:Straits Category:Geography of Somalia
title: Guardafui Channel
